author: Frank J
title: Ourstanding as always
text:
I have a saying that my idea of camping is staying at the Marriott when the Ritz Carlton is full. Well, they didn't disappoint this time either. Everything was right on. Yes if you have a couple of drinks and call your liquor in the bar, the check is going to be big. Remember you're in New York, not Jacksonville. But everything is thought of. Room is not hip, just incredibly comfortable, huge for New York. The staff friendly and helpful but unobtrusive. The location, read the address it doesn't get any better than this. Yes New York is full of the latest hip hotels, but what you thought was going to be an adventurous weekend turns into a royal pain. In New York, it doesn't get any better than this.As always, the Ritz Carlton is an outstanding hotel that does things incredibily right.
